cleaned_text: Immune System Boost Tumbled Crystal Healing Sets $5.99 This product is currently sold out. Chevron Amethyst, Moss Agate, Quartz, & Sodalite are a special combination of stones said to aid, repair, & boost the body's immune system. Every Tumbled Crystal Set is individually packaged with 4 Genuine Crystal Gemstones (approximately 3/4 inch to 1 & 1/4 inch each), Black Velour Pouch (2x2.5 inch), and Description Card. Also included with every crystal order are detailed crystal Programming Instructions & Cleansing Instructions. Please Note: Due to crystal availability, substitutions may occasionally occur. Please Note: This item is not to be construed as a recommendation of medical treatment or medication.
